aboutMe.title: Let's work together
aboutMe.description: I am a Front-end developer based in Munich, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life.  I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position. If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

meineProjekte.title: My work
meineProjekte.text: Feel free to try out my latest web development projects and look into their code.

contact.title: Contact
contact.headline: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.name: Your name
contact.privacyPolicy2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
